relatedBlades.title: Simplify your AI initiatives
relatedBlades.copy: Create an AI strategy that allows you to consume, build, protect, and defend at scale. Power and protect your AI applications with Cloudflare's global GPU network.

relatedBlades.title: Complex, costly toolchains and security risks hamper AI development
relatedBlades.copy: The rising cost of GPUs, multi-vendor AI toolchains, and data security concerns complicate and slow down AI innovation.

columnContent.title: GPU scarcity
columnContent.description: High demand and rising GPU costs often force companies to build costly multicloud architectures.

columnContent.title: Complex AI toolchains
columnContent.description: Stitching together solutions from multiple vendors impacts visibility and slows down innovation.

columnContent.title: Lack of data security and privacy
columnContent.description: Security concerns — from protecting intellectual property to building with responsible AI — can introduce risk.

relatedBlades.title: Simplify and secure your AI initiatives with Cloudflare
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare's [connectivity cloud](https://www.cloudflare.com/connectivity-cloud/) offers a robust, secure AI application infrastructure via scalable cloud-native services, which eliminates the need for multiple vendors.

columnContent.title: GPU scarcity
columnContent.description: Run AI inference and generate embeddings closer to your end users from a global network of NVIDIA GPUs.

columnContent.title: Store models and AI-generated assets
columnContent.description: Easily and affordably store assets, train LLMs, and build multicloud architectures with zero egress fees and limitless object storage.

columnContent.title: Security and privacy
columnContent.description: Secure sensitive data from risks and misuse when working with generative AI APIs.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare's connectivity cloud secures and streamlines AI development
relatedBlades.description: Cloudflare makes it easy to build and deploy AI applications from the exact same servers as every other service in the connectivity cloud — without sacrificing security or performance.

columnContent.title: Use
columnContent.description: Define policies around appropriate AI usage, create filters to ensure data privacy, and reduce your vulnerabilities when using third-party tools with generative AI capabilities.

columnContent.title: Build
columnContent.description: Run generative AI tasks — such as image and text generation, classification, and speech recognition — on Nvidia GPUs from over 100 global locations.

columnContent.title: Secure
columnContent.description: Prevent proprietary data leaks, safeguard private data from LLM training models, and ensure compliance with data regulations.

columnContent.title: Enhance
columnContent.description: Use AI to strengthen your security posture by detecting malicious JavaScript content, identifying risks, automating threat intelligence, and more.

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Cloudflare helps 42able.ai decrease development time while improving AI performance

content.value: 42able.ai needed a technology partner that could help them streamline the creation and deployment of their AI business development tools. Cloudflare offered superior performance compared to other cloud providers — thanks to our competitive pricing, local development features, and no cold boot times.
Now, 42able.ai can innovate rapidly while simultaneously improving security and performance for their AI products.
"Training and deploying AI models is challenging. Cloudflare's solutions are making it much easier than managing all the individual parts ourselves."

features.title: ChainFuse
features.description: Workers AI and Vectorize enable ChainFuse to organize, categorize, and unify unstructured user feedback

features.title: OpenSay
features.description: The HuggingFace and Workers AI integration helps OpenSay test language models like Llama Guard to identify user-based behaviors

features.title: Suki-Desu
features.description: Workers AI gives Suki-Desu a cost-effective way to translate text across multiple WordPress sites

features.title: Audioflare
features.description: AI Gateway manages the performance and reliability of Audioflare with analytics, logging, caching, and rate limiting

features.title: Discourse
features.description: Workers AI powers the "related topics" functionality on the Cloudflare Community Discourse — helping instantly connect users to relevant information

features.title: RightBlogger
features.description: AI Gateway tracks down errors, identifies bugs, and logs requests to help RightBlogger correct issues while minimizing costs
